SELECT LISTAGG(tag_code, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tag_code DESC) AS tag_codes FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT tag_code FROM hashtag )
mapper.insert: SELECT ACCOUNT_SEQ.currval AS acc_no FROM dual INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(acc_no, acc_id, acc_pw, acc_name, acc_date, acc_grade) VALUES(ACCOUNT_SEQ.nextval, #{acc_id}, #{acc_pw}, #{acc_name}, sysdate, 15)
INSERT INTO RECOMMEND(recom_no, acc_no, tag_no, recom_seq, recom_date) VALUES(RECOMMEND_SEQ.nextval, #{acc_no}, #{tag_no}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT acc_no, acc_id, acc_pw, acc_name, acc_tel, acc_age, acc_date, acc_grade, acc_img, acc_saved_img, acc_thumb_img, acc_img_size FROM account WHERE acc_no = #{acc_no}
SELECT acc_no, acc_id, acc_pw, acc_name, acc_tel, acc_age, acc_date, acc_grade, acc_img, acc_saved_img, acc_thumb_img, acc_img_size FROM account WHERE acc_id = #{acc_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACC_LOG(acc_log_no, acc_no, acc_log_ip, acc_log_time) VALUES(ACC_LOG_SEQ.nextval, #{acc_no}, #{acc_log_ip}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT LISTAGG(h.tag_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tag_code DESC) AS tag_name FROM recommend r INNER JOIN hashtag h ON h.tag_no = r.tag_no WHERE r.acc_no = #{acc_no}
SELECT scon_no, scon_title, scon_contents, scon_date FROM share_contents WHERE acc_no = #{acc_no} ORDER BY scon_date ASC
SELECT file_no, scon_no, file_origin_name, file_upload_name, file_thumb_name, file_size, file_date FROM share_image WHERE scon_no = #{scon_no} ORDER BY file_no ASC
SELECT file_no, qcon_no, file_origin_name, file_upload_name, file_thumb_name, file_size, file_date FROM qna_image WHERE qcon_no = #{qcon_no} ORDER BY file_no ASC

SELECT sc.scon_no, sc.scon_title, sc.scon_contents, sc.scon_date, sc.scon_views, sc.scon_priority FROM account a INNER JOIN share_mark sm ON sm.acc_no = a.acc_no INNER JOIN share_contents sc ON sc.scon_no = sm.scon_no WHERE a.acc_no = #{acc_no} ORDER BY sc.scon_date ASC

SELECT qc.qcon_no, qc.qcon_name, qc.qcon_contents, qc.qcon_date, qc.qcon_views FROM account a INNER JOIN qna_mark qm ON qm.acc_no = a.acc_no INNER JOIN qna_contents qc ON qc.qcon_no = qm.qcon_no WHERE a.acc_no = #{acc_no} ORDER BY qc.qcon_date ASC
